name: stella twist headband
sizes_available: child: 50.5 cm x 10.5 cm (approx. 19.88" x 4.15"); teen/ adult women: 52 cm x 10.5cm (approx. 20.5" x 4.15")
notes:
the stella twist headband is a pretty crochet twist headband featuring a knit-look crochet ribbing and star stitches! 

the visual crocheters will appreciate the detailed picture tutorials for the star stitch and for making the knot at the front of the headband.
